
Usage: is-current-year [options] [<value>]

Options:

  -h,    --help                Print this message.
  -V,    --version             Print the package version.
  -i,    --input-file FILE     Read input from FILE.
  -o,    --output-file FILE    Write output to FILE.
         --sep SEP             Separate output values; values are separated by SEP.
  -s,    --strides STRIDES     Stride arrays; input values are separated by STRIDES.
  -w,    --width WIDTH         Format arrays with WIDTH columns.
  -r,    --rowmajor            Format arrays in row-major order.
  -c,    --colmajor            Format arrays in column-major order.
         --beep                Play a terminal bell upon completion.
  -L,    --no-longinfo         Do not print long documentation.
  -D,    --no-description      Do not print package description.
  -H,    --no-header           Do not print package name and version header.

Input (cli): incrspace
